name: Apprentris (BetaJam 2)
description:
I ported this to GM:S 1 to allow those that don't have GMS2 to play it as an .exe file, you can find it here: https://attaboy.itch.io/apprentris

The Master Wizard is away, but the Apprentice shall play! Prevent the blocks from piling up and go for a high score!

[Updated the files because I don't think I previously included enough source files to run the game properly]

Controller is highly recommended, but game detects keyboard vs. controller:

Move: A + D/LStick/Arrow Keys

Jump: Space/A Button/X Button

Magic: Hold or release Click/RT

Aim: Mouse/LStick

Pause: Esc/Start

Music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/~/Neoakushon
